abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Registeel ex by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Steel Wave
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon of the same type as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
